an8.8:1.1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā uttaro mahisavatthusmiṁ viharati saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṁ.
an8.8:1.2: Tatra kho āyasmā uttaro bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.8:1.3: “sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attavipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:1.4: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ paravipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:1.5: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attasampattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:1.6: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ parasampattiṁ paccavekkhitā hotī”ti.
an8.8:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena vessavaṇo mahārājā uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇaṁ disaṁ gacchati kenacideva karaṇīyena.
an8.8:2.2: Assosi kho vessavaṇo mahārājā āyasmato uttarassa mahisavatthusmiṁ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desentassa:
an8.8:2.3: “sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attavipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:2.4: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ paravipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:2.5: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attasampattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:2.6: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ parasampattiṁ paccavekkhitā hotī”ti.
an8.8:3.1: Atha kho vessavaṇo mahārājā—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya; evamevaṁ mahisavatthusmiṁ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṁ antarahito devesu tāvatiṁsesu pāturahosi.
an8.8:3.2: Atha kho vessavaṇo mahārājā yena sakko devānamindo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ etadavoca:
an8.8:3.4: Eso āyasmā uttaro mahisavatthusmiṁ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ deseti:
an8.8:3.5: ‘sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attavipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:4.1: Atha kho sakko devānamindo seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya, pasāritaṁ vā bāhaṁ samiñjeyya; evamevaṁ devesu tāvatiṁsesu antarahito mahisavatthusmiṁ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṁ āyasmato uttarassa sammukhe pāturahosi.
an8.8:4.2: Atha kho sakko devānamindo yenāyasmā uttaro tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ uttaraṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho sakko devānamindo āyasmantaṁ uttaraṁ etadavoca:
an8.8:5.1: “Saccaṁ kira, bhante, āyasmā uttaro bhikkhūnaṁ evaṁ dhammaṁ desesi:
an8.8:5.2: ‘sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attavipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti,
an8.8:5.7: “Kiṁ panidaṁ, bhante, āyasmato uttarassa sakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ, udāhu tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti?
an8.8:5.9: Upamāya m’idhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājānanti.
an8.8:6.1: Seyyathāpi, devānaminda, gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahādhaññarāsi.
an8.8:6.4: Yo nu kho, devānaminda, taṁ mahājanakāyaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ puccheyya:
an8.8:6.5: ‘kuto imaṁ dhaññaṁ āharathā’ti, kathaṁ byākaramāno nu kho, devānaminda, so mahājanakāyo sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti?
an8.8:6.6: “‘Amumhā mahādhaññarāsimhā āharāmā’ti kho, bhante, so mahājanakāyo sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti.
an8.8:6.7: “Evamevaṁ kho, devānaminda, yaṁ kiñci subhāsitaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
an8.8:6.8: Tato upādāyupādāya mayaṁ caññe ca bhaṇāmā”ti.
an8.8:7.3: ‘yaṁ kiñci subhāsitaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ tassa bhagavato vacanaṁ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
an8.8:7.5: Ekamidaṁ, bhante uttara, samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
an8.8:7.6: Tatra kho bhagavā devadattaṁ ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.8:8.1: ‘Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ attavipattiṁ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:8.2: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṁ paravipattiṁ …pe…
an8.8:8.5: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.8:8.7: Lābhena hi, bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho;
an8.8:8.14: pāpamittatāya, bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.8:8.15: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahi asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.8:9.1: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:10.1: Kiñca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:11.1: Yaṁ hissa, bhikkhave, uppannaṁ lābhaṁ anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya viharato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an8.8:11.8: uppannaṁ pāpamittataṁ anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyuṁ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, uppannaṁ pāpamittataṁ abhibhuyya viharato evaṁsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an8.8:11.9: Idaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṁ paṭicca uppannaṁ lābhaṁ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:13.1: Ettāvatā, bhante uttara, manussesu catasso parisā—
an8.8:13.4: Uggaṇhatu, bhante, āyasmā uttaro imaṁ dhammapariyāyaṁ.
an8.8:13.5: Pariyāpuṇātu, bhante, āyasmā uttaro imaṁ dhammapariyāyaṁ.
an8.8:13.6: Dhāretu, bhante, āyasmā uttaro imaṁ dhammapariyāyaṁ.
